system.effect: The eyes and ears of the ship. +5 to Manoeuvre Tests to avoid celestial phenomena, but -2 Detection. +50 Achievement Points for Completing Exploration Objectives. Can only be damaged/destroyed by critical hit.

description.value: The eyes and ears of the ship. +5 to Manoeuvre Tests to avoid celestial phenomena, but -2 Detection. +50 Achievement Points for Completing Exploration Objectives. Can only be damaged/destroyed by critical hit.
